title: Resume Builder
description: Your streamlined solution for crafting a polished and comprehensive resume document. It simplifies the process by guiding you through inputting essential details like personal information, academic background, work experience, and other pertinent information into a user-friendly interface.

title: Image to Pdf
description: Transform your images into PDF documents effortlessly with our Image to PDF Converter tool. Upload multiple images in formats like PNG, JPG, or JPEG, customize PDF quality, rearrange image order, and generate downloadable PDFs instantly.

title: Image Resizer
description: Quickly adjust the dimensions of your images with our Image Resize Tool.

title: Pdf Generator
description: Create professional PDF documents effortlessly with our PDF Generator tool. Customize fonts and styles to suit your needs.

title: Image Merger
description: Merge multiple images into one with our easy-to-use Image Merge Tool. Choose between horizontal or vertical layouts, adjust sizes, and download your merged image.

title: Html Editor
description: A simple HTML editor lets you write and edit HTML code easily, with a live preview to see your changes in real-time. Perfect for beginners and quick testing!

title: Sticky Notes
description: A versatile and interactive sticky notes web app that lets you create, edit, delete, and download notes. Perfect for organizing thoughts, tasks, or reminders in a visually appealing way. Easily save and download your notes with random filenames for easy access!

title: To-do List
description: A simple and interactive To-Do List application to help you manage your daily tasks efficiently.

title: Unit Converter
description: A simple and efficient unit converter for length, weight, and temperature conversions. Instantly convert between meters, feet, kilograms, pounds, Celsius, Fahrenheit, and more.

title: Weather App
description: Stay updated with real-time weather forecasts using our Weather App. Get accurate temperature, humidity, wind speed, and weather conditions for any location. Enjoy a user-friendly interface with detailed weather insights at your fingertips.

title: Bar Chart Generator
description: Visualize your data easily with our Bar Chart Generator. Create customizable bar charts with adjustable labels, colors, and values. Perfect for presentations, reports, and data analysis.

title: Box Shadow Generator
description: Easily create CSS box shadows with our Box Shadow Generator. Customize shadow intensity, blur, spread, and color to enhance your web designs. Get instant CSS code for seamless integration.

title: Dice Roller
description: Roll virtual dice anytime with our Dice Roller tool. Choose different dice types, roll multiple dice at once, and get random outcomes for board games, RPGs, and fun activities.

title: EMI Calculator
description: Plan your loans efficiently with our EMI Calculator. Calculate your Equated Monthly Installments (EMIs) based on loan amount, interest rate, and tenure. Get a clear repayment schedule instantly.

title: Markdown Editor
description: Write and preview Markdown effortlessly with our Markdown Editor. Convert Markdown to formatted text, preview in real-time, and export content for blogs, notes, and documentation.

title: Maze Generator
description: Generate random mazes with our Maze Generator. Solve challenging mazes or use them for puzzles and game design. Customize difficulty levels and explore endless possibilities.

title: Memory Card Game
description: Test your memory with our fun Memory Card Game. Flip cards, match pairs, and challenge yourself to complete the game in the shortest time possible.

title: Password Generator
description: Create secure passwords instantly with our Password Generator. Customize length, include special characters, and generate strong passwords to keep your accounts safe.

title: Pie Chart Generator
description: Visualize data in a clear and engaging way with our Pie Chart Generator. Customize labels, colors, and values to create stunning pie charts for reports and presentations.

title: Pomodoro Timer
description: Boost your productivity with our Pomodoro Timer. Utilize the proven Pomodoro technique to stay focused by working in timed intervals with short breaks. Customize session lengths and track your progress effortlessly.

title: Code Minifier
description: Optimize your code with our Code Minifier. Reduce file size by minifying HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, improving website performance and load times. Simply paste your code and get a compact, efficient version instantly.

title: Draw Pad
description: Unleash your creativity with our Draw Pad. Sketch, doodle, and create digital art effortlessly with a simple and intuitive drawing tool. Customize brush sizes, colors, and save your creations instantly.

title: Colour Palette Generator
description: Create stunning colour palettes effortlessly with our Colour Palette Generator. Generate harmonious colour schemes, explore trendy combinations, and save your favourites for design inspiration.

title: Tic Tac Toe
description: Enjoy a classic game of Tic Tac Toe with an advanced twist! Play against a friend or challenge yourself.

title: Words Counter
description: Analyze and count the number of words, sentences, paragraphs, letters, and top keywords in your text.

title: Text Replace
description: Enhance productivity with our interactive text replace tool. Easily find and replace text.

title: Dictionary
description: Discover meanings, phonetics, and examples of words. Perfect for quick reference.

title: QR Code Generator
description: Generate custom QR codes instantly with this easy-to-use tool. Customize QR code size, colors, and correction level.

title: Rich Text Editor
description: Easily edit and format text with our intuitive Online Rich Text Editor. Includes a convenient print function.

title: File Encryption
description: Protect your sensitive files with our Secure File Encryption and Decryption Tool. Set a password and encrypt files with AES-GCM encryption.

title: Music Player
description: Discover and play songs in high-quality audio with a stylish and intuitive interface.

title: Simple Text Editor
description: A user-friendly web-based text editor that allows you to create and edit text with a variety of fonts.

title: QuickLink: Url Shortener
description: Shorten URLs instantly. Easily generate compact links for sharing and tracking, with built-in redirection timers.

title: Text to Speech
description: Convert text into spoken words, with adjustable playback speed and intuitive controls.

title: URL Saver
description: Save and retrieve links effortlessly with our URL Saver Tool. Securely store and access URLs using unique IDs.

title: Gradient WallGen
description: Generate vibrant gradient wallpapers and download your favorite designs instantly.

title: YouTube Embed Player
description: Embed and watch YouTube videos with our sleek, dark-themed player.

title: Excel File Viewer
description: View XLS and XLSX files quickly without software. Perfect for accessing spreadsheet data on any device.

title: Messaging App
description: A peer-to-peer chat app enables direct communication between users without a central server.

title: Simple Chat
description: A P2P chat app for secure and efficient messaging.

title: Whiteboard
description: Collaborative digital space for drawing, writing, and sharing ideas in real time.

title: File Transfer
description: A P2P file transfer tool enables secure file sharing between devices without central servers.
